Spain: García Sánchez I died. He was succeeded by his eldest son Sancho II of Pamplona. A small territory around Viguera he willed to another son as the Kingdom of Viguera.
Fernán González died. He was succeeded as count of Castile by his son García Fernández of the White Hands of Castile.
Lebanon: The Fatimides settled in Egypt and extended their authority to the coastal region of Bilad al-Sham and Damascus.
